name: AML League
author: Laurent Dorier

sections.description:
Like me you need a tool to manage a league for your badminton club website and didn’t find anything to fill exactly your need…
Maybe Aml Leagues can help you.

Feedback is welcome for this initial release, because I can’t figure all your need. ðŸ˜‰

This tool allows administrators to create and manage flexible leagues.

You will be able to manage clubs, players, matches…
With customized roles, you can set other users as AML admins to help you to manage everything.

With help of few shortcodes, it’s really easy to display infos on your frontend ( league summary, table, matches…) on the frontend website.

Layout customizable

There is no option to directly edit the layout, but if you have css knowledge you can customize the layout on the frontend site.

You can edit your theme css file or better add an aml-league.css file in your theme folder.

Documentation

Will come later…
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/aml-league directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the ‘AML Leagues’ Link to manage your leagues
  4. Create a league
  5. Add clubs
  6. Add players
  7. Generate first league days
  8. Add shortcodes to your pages or posts
sections.faq:
What is the best way to get support ?

I will try to answer very quickly any request sent to lolo_irie@etalkers.org or posted on the wordpress.org forum about this plugin.
But please, describe correctly your issue and be patient…
sections.changelog:
1.0 – 25.04.2023

  • Initial release: basic features

1.0.1 – 14.06.2023

  • Add an option to set team captains
  • Allow to automatically create a menu on frontend

1.0.2 – 18.07.2023

  • Add option to create ICS files

1.0.3 – 25.07.2023

  • Players compare tool enhanced

1.1 – 25.07.2023

  • Club statistics

1.2 – 25.08.2023

  • Club progress

1.2.4 – 19.10.2023

  • Statistics bugs fix
  • Smartphone layout in admin area

1.2.5 – 26.11.2023

  • Club progress only for played games

short_description: Tool to manage a badminton league (probably able to manage other sports)
